main event: On January 15, 1968, several sightings of unidentified flying objects (UFOs) were reported in Dayton, Ohio, highlighting their luminous and maneuverable nature.
interesting points: Witnesses reported seeing glowing objects that changed colors and moved rapidly,One observer claimed the object was oval-shaped and about 30 to 40 feet in diameter,Multiple sightings occurred over different days in January 1968, including a detailed account from Mr. Robert Riggs,The Air Force initiated investigations for each report but often found insufficient data for identification.
witness description: a resident of Dayton who saw the object at approximately 6:00 PM
